title: Delhi's Air Makes Many People Sick
summary: In Delhi, India, many people are getting sick because the air is very dirty. Over 200,000 cases of breathing problems were recorded in six big hospitals from 2022 to 2024. More than 30,000 people had to go to the hospital because they couldn't breathe well. The air quality is often very bad, especially in winter, and it can be 20 times worse than what is safe. This happens because of things like cars, factories, and farmers burning leftover crops. The government is studying this problem, and courts are asking for action to clean the air. Kids are also getting sick from the dirty air, so it's a big issue for everyone.

background_read: Delhi is a big city in India where many people live. Sometimes, the air gets very dirty from things like cars, factories, and burning crops. This dirty air can make it hard to breathe and cause sicknesses. Doctors in hospitals see more patients when the air is bad. The government and courts are trying to find ways to make the air cleaner so people can stay healthy.

WHAT: Over 200,000 cases of breathing illnesses in hospitals due to dirty air.
WHERE: Delhi, India, in six state-run hospitals.
WHY: Because of pollution from cars, factories, and crop burning, especially in winter.
